name: RUE (UrBoiRAD)
description:
GAME MADE FOR #DevSquadJam

Get out of the Ainter universe by running through the blue and red worlds. 

The goal of the game is to get to the goal as fast as possible.  There are also tokens to collect to build up a score. This creates two categories Any% and 100%. It also creates arcade elements as you can compete for the fastest time.

(The HTML version doesn't work very well. So i recommend downloading the EXE)
